text: John Joseph Cremona (January 6, 1918 â€“ December 24, 2020) was a Maltese politician and lawyer. He was the Attorney General of Malta during independence talks in 1964. He helped write the Constitution of Malta. He was the chief justice of Malta from 1971 to 1981.List of former Chief Justices. Judiciary of Malta. Retrieved 30 October 2019.Former Chief Justice John J. Cremona turns 101 Cremona died at the age of 102 on December 24, 2020. ==References== Category:1918 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Maltese politicians Category:Maltese lawyers Category:Judges
title: John Cremona
